title: WATCH: Donald Trump Says He Would Love To Run Against Kanye
content:
Posted Wednesday, September 2nd 2015 @ 11am 
 
During an interview  with Rolling Stone, GOP front-runner Donald Trump was asked about Kanye West 's announcement during the MTV's Video Music Awards that he will be running for President in 2020 . 
 
Trump told the magazine that Kanye is a 'nice guy' and that he hopes to 'run against him someday.'
